title: Chilli beef and taco salad
ingredients: ['500g lean minced steak', '2 garlic cloves, crushed', '1 tsp crushed chilli flakes', '2 tbsp sun-dried tomato paste', '3 tbsp chopped fresh oregano, or 1 tsp dried', 'juice of 1 lemon', '1/4 iceberg lettuce, torn', '2 ripe avocados, halved, stoned and sliced', '1 red onion, thinly sliced', '3 tomatoes, chopped', '75g tortilla chips']
